notes:
### Please read the Readme before enable TagSoku mod
- [Readme - Install Instruction - TagSoku.txt](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/313220600057561088/1443226909373628476/Readme-TagSoku.txt)
- When using Tag Burst or Border Break, prioritize the use the free bomb charges
- Tag Burst cost: 2 cards -> 3 cards
- Border Break cost: 2 cards -> 3 cards
- only compatible with Soku2 2.30g, no lower Soku2 version
